abstract: Faced with cutoff scores that reached "a near-impossible" 100 percent in some cases, some Indian students are casting a longing glance toward American colleges.
snippet: Faced with cutoff scores that reached "a near-impossible" 100 percent in some cases, some Indian students are casting a longing glance toward American colleges.

headline.main: To Indian Students, Harvard's Admission Rate May Appear Almost Welcoming
